caption.p: (A) Cyclic voltammograms of the colligative spike-in test with adenine, guanine, and cytosine. The corresponding concentrations show a linear relationship between the concentration of (B) adenine, (C) guanine, (D) cytosine, and peak oxidative current with increasing spike-in amount between 0.4 and 20 Î¼M ( n = 3).
